channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ICE officer kills a Minneapolis driver as Trump’s latest immigration operation begins
item.description: Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey says the Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer who shot and killed a motorist acted recklessly, and he rejected federal officials’ claims that the officer had acted in self-defense.

item.title: Trump immigration policies and aging population slow US growth projection, budget office says
President Trump says his voters loved the Venezuela attack — here’s what they think
